etymology.interpretation: The character 夊(suī, "footprint pointing down") visually depicts the shape of a footprint, indicating an action of stepping or moving downward, contrasting with 止(zhǐ, "stop"), which illustrates a foot moving upwards.

examples.chinese: 书法家笔下的夊字传达出足迹向下的意境(書法家筆下的夊字傳達出足跡向下的意境)。
examples.pinyin: Shūfǎjiā bǐxià de suī zì chuándá chū zújì xiàng xià de yìjìng.
examples.english: The calligraphic form of the character suī conveys the imagery of footprints pointing downward.

examples.chinese: 古代雕刻中常用夊象征行走(古代雕刻中常用夊象徵行走)，展示追寻足迹的智慧(展示追尋足跡的智慧)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài diāokè zhōng cháng yòng suī xiàngzhēng xíngzǒu, zhǎnshì zhuīxún zújì de zhìhuì.
examples.english: In ancient carvings, suī is often used to symbolize walking, displaying the wisdom of following one’s trail.
